pages.text: After $(l:concepts/wild_magic)the fall of the Order of Druids$(), many sought to enhance the power of wild magic in order to make it equivalent to that which they had lost.$(br2)While their purpose was selfish, the final result of the Grove Stone was surprisingly useful as a magnifier of wild magic, as well as a catalyst for crafting.$(br2)While simulating the Fey was
